attributes.action: bring all troops home to help out with the water emergency at home
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: with all our armed forces helping out other countries around the world, surely in our current rain emergency. its time that they help us at home. its no good helping others when its us who need help as well. lets get our armed forces building dams and flood defences here, before we help everyone else.
